attributes.action: prioritise future consideration of Basford Hall within the capital programme of the East Midlands Learning and Skills Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 2006 local community groups initiated a campaign resulting in overwhelming community support to retain the Basford Hall site for further educational purposes.

We are now at a critical position whereby the East Midlands Learning and Skills Council will be drawing up their list of future capital programmes.

We are therefore making this call for all those that read this site to take time out and add support to this petition to ensure that the urgent educational and economic needs of the Nottingham North are treated as a priority.
